name: company-name-color
label: Company Name Text Color
description: The color of the company name in the main page navigation / header. Note that if you upload a company logo, then the company name text is not displayed.

name: font-family-company-name
label: Company Name Font
description: The font or fonts used in the company name in the main page navigation / header.

name: font-family-base
label: Main Font
description: The primary font or fonts used throughout the app.

name: header-bg-color
label: Popup Header Background Color
description: The background color of the popup main content area. Text will be placed in this section and therefore this color should have sharp contrast to the Popup Header Text Color.

name: header-color
label: Popup Header Text Color
description: The main text color of the main content area. Should have a sharp contrast to the Popup Header Background Color.

name: body-bg-color
label: Popup Body Background Color
description: The background color of the popup main content area. Text will be placed in this section and therefore this color should have sharp contrast to the Popup Body Text Color.

name: body-color
label: Popup Body Text Color
description: The text color of the main content area. Should have a sharp contrast to the Popup Body Background Color.

name: brand-primary
label: Primary Color
description: 'Primary' color, used for 'call to action' text and buttons. Generally your brand color is used.

name: btn-primary-color
label: Primary Button Text Color
description: 'Primary' button text color. Should be a strong contrast to your Primary Brand Color.

name: form-error-bg-color
label: Input Background Error Color
description: The color for form inputs when the value is not valid.

name: border-radius
label: Popup Border Radius
description: Allows you to set a curve to the corners of the popup window.

name: input-border-radius
label: Input Border Radius
description: Allows you to set a curve to the border of form input elements.

name: input-bg
label: Input Background Color
description: The background color for form inputs.

name: input-color
label: Input Text Color
description: The text color for form inputs.

name: placeholder-color
label: Input Placeholder Text Color
description: The text color for 'placeholder' text form inputs (used for prompts and icons within inputs, generally is lighter than the input text color).
